response.overview: Noa Koler (Checkout, The Wedding Plan) and Assi Cohen (Significant Other) are fantastic in this dark comedy about a religious couple who secretly lead a secular lifestyle behind closed doors. Their routine of secrecy is completely upended when their teenage daughter catches them in their bedroom, committing a serious sin according to Jewish lawâ€”watching TV on Shabbat.
response.title: The Holiness (Ki Tetse)
